#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define  M 1000000007
#define  mp make_pair
#define  pb push_back
#define inf 99999999
#define fi first
#define se second
#define PI 3.1415926535897932
typedef long long int ll;
typedef unsigned long long int ull;
int b, n;
ll memo[201][101][101][3];
ll func(int b, int n,int runs,int dots)
{
    if(dots>2||n<0||b<0)
        return 0;
    if(b==0)
    {
        if(runs>=100)
            return 1;
        return 0;
    }
    if(runs>=100)
        return 1;
    if(memo[b][n][runs][dots]!=-1)
        return memo[b][n][runs][dots];
    else
    {
        return memo[b][n][runs][dots]=(func(b,n-1,runs,dots)+func(b,n-1,runs+1,dots)+func(b,n-1,runs+2,dots)+func(b,n-1,runs+4,dots)+
                func(b,n-1,runs+6,dots)+func(b-1,n,runs,dots+1)+func(b-1,n,runs+1,0)
                +func(b-1,n,runs+2,0)+func(b-1,n,runs+4,0)+func(b-1,n,runs+6,0))%M;
    }
 
}
int main()
{
    int i,j,t;
    memset(memo,-1,sizeof(memo));
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d %d",&b,&n);
        if((b+n)*6<100)
        {
            printf("0\n");
            continue;
        }
        ll ans=func(b,n,0,0);
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
